taskbody.context: If a page is not rendering properly in some browsers, you can force the theme to be rendered in XHTML or HTML5 by creating a DocType XML file.

step.cmd: Create a DocType XML file with the same name as your layout template file, followed by .doctype.xml.
step.stepxmp: If your layout template file is called MyAwesomeLayout.html, give your DocType file the name MyAwesomeLayout.doctype.xml.

step.cmd: Enter the appropriate code in your DocType file.

ul.li:
For XHTML Strict,
<SkinDocType> <![CDATA[<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">]]> </SkinDocType>

For XHTML Transitional,
<SkinDocType> <![CDATA[<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">]]> </SkinDocType>
